title: Azir E not working correctly?

embed.description: Watch 8-11 NA1-2799324282 01 GIF on Gfycat. Discover more leagueoflegends GIFs on Gfycat.

body: So I made a thread on the gameplay forum though that was a mistake. Long story short it seems Azir's E does not work correctly? Is this intended or is it a bug? I mean the tooltip still clearly says that he would get an extra sandsoldier.

replies.body: I believe you get an extra CHARGE of your W, not a soldier immediately spawning
Ahh you are right okay seems i misunderstood then all is well in azir land.
